p: A portion of the powdered plant material (30~40 g) was extracted by hydrodistillation for 3 h in a Clevenger-type collector apparatus. Essential oils were isolated following the method described in the Pharmacopoeia of Russia [ 17]. The essential oils produced in this study were extracted from all of the aerial parts of the plant. All experiments were done in triplicate and the obtained results were expressed on the basis of air-dry weight.
